answers.answer: I had mine at 20 weeks and they don't make you repeat if you pass so I would talk to your Dr and see if it's really necessary. If they say it is maybe it's better to be safe.
Thnks dear i already booked my appointment with my doctor on Thursday let see what see will say

If my doctor thinks I should do the test, i will. I have been diagnosed with gestational diabetes this time unfortunately. I didn't have it with my first one. Now I am mobitoring my sugar level four times a day. Better to be safe than sorry. Good luck.
You don't have to have a history of diabetes to get gestational diabetes. It is safer for you and the baby to know whether you have it or not so that you can take action to treat it if need be.

question: Hi im 25 weeks pregnant and i had my gtt test when i was 19 weeks pregnant and none of my doctors know why my midwife asked me to go for glucose test that early but reports was normal and. Thy want me to and usually ask for glucose test in 26 weeks so thy asked me to do so but i dont want to go for it again its my 3 rd pregnancy and i never had these test with my previous and i m not overweight niether dont have diabetes history as well just need suggestions what shall i do isnt there any different ways to take diabetes or glucose test ? Any ideaThanks
title: Can I refuse Glucose test?
